services.title: Practice Areas
services.subtitle: Our Core Legal Services
services.description: With deep legal expertise and extensive cross-border experience, we provide exceptional legal services in the following areas

crossBorder.title: Cross-Border Investment & M&A
crossBorder.description: Comprehensive legal support for foreign investors establishing businesses in China, M&A transactions, and equity deals, including due diligence, transaction structuring, and contract negotiation.

internationalTrade.title: International Trade
internationalTrade.description: Handling international trade contract disputes, cross-border trade compliance, customs matters, anti-dumping and countervailing duty investigations, protecting your international trade interests.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.description: Full-spectrum IP legal services including trademark registration, patent applications, copyright protection, and trade secret protection, safeguarding your innovations.

corporate.title: Corporate Legal Services
corporate.description: Legal counsel services for daily business operations, including corporate governance, contract review, employment matters, and compliance management.

dispute.title: International Dispute Resolution
dispute.description: Representation in international commercial arbitration, foreign-related litigation, and cross-border mediation, with extensive experience in CIETAC, ICC, HKIAC and other arbitration institutions.

realestate.title: Real Estate & Construction
realestate.description: Legal services for real estate development, construction projects, and property management, including project financing, land use, and construction contracts.
